newsitem.title: USA: Labor Ready May same-store sales up 46 pct.
newsitem.headline: Labor Ready May same-store sales up 46 pct.

text.p: Labor Ready Inc, a provider of temporary labor services, on Thursday said same store sales for the four weeks ended May 23 rose 46 percent from year ago levels while total sales rose 114 percent.
Total sales for the period grew to $24.5 million from $11.4 million last year.

"Sales growth remains balanced across our geographic areas and our new stores opened this year continue to generate significantly higher average sales than stores opened last year," Glenn Welstad, chairman, said in a statement.
